title: Enforcer Club
content:
Enforcer Club Uncommon 1~4 Damage 1d4 Bludgeoning Non-Lethality: This weapon deals only Non-Lethal Damage. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Sometimes the blunt application of fear (and, admittedly, some swinging elbows) is the difference between continued chaos and the re- establishment of order. Club Light 0.9 65

Non-Lethality: This weapon deals only Non-Lethal Damage.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:
